messages.content: Awesome, let's plan to change the theme from green to blue

Love it — clean visual shift.

Here’s a practical plan to move the app theme from green to blue with low risk:

- Audit where green is defined (global CSS variables, Tailwind classes, component-level hardcoded colors).
- Introduce/replace semantic theme tokens (e.g. `--color-primary`, `--color-primary-600`) so blue is centralized.
- Update shared UI primitives first (buttons, links, badges, focus rings), then page-specific accents.
- Verify contrast/accessibility for blue states (normal, hover, disabled, text on blue backgrounds).
- Run `npm run check` and `npm run build` to catch regressions.
- Do a quick visual pass on key screens (desktop + mobile, light/dark if supported).

Recommended implementation approach:
- Prefer changing design tokens/variables once rather than touching lots of scattered `text-green-*` / `bg-green-*` usages.
- Keep one canonical blue palette (e.g. 50–900 scale) to avoid inconsistent shades.

If you want, I can do the audit now and give you an exact file-by-file change list before editing.

Great call. I audited the app and found all theme-related green usage. No edits made yet.

**File-by-file change list**
- `services/app/src/app.css:7` update core palette vars from green-tinted neutrals to blue-tinted neutrals (`--stacked-bg`, `--stacked-surface`, `--stacked-border`), and set `--stacked-accent` to a blue.
- `services/app/src/app.css:17` change the first radial background accent (`#dbeee6`) to a blue family tone so the page atmosphere matches the new theme.

- `services/app/src/routes/+page.svelte:34` change Flowbite badge mapping for `clean` from `'green'` to `'blue'`.
- `services/app/src/routes/+page.svelte:184` switch all teal/emerald UI accents to blue (`text-teal-700`, `bg-teal-700`, `hover:bg-teal-800`, `disabled:bg-teal-500`, `hover:bg-teal-50/50`, `text-teal-800`, `text-teal-700`, success alert emerald classes).

- `services/app/src/routes/stacks/[id]/+page.svelte:10` change Flowbite badge mapping for `clean` from `'green'` to `'blue'`.
- `services/app/src/routes/stacks/[id]/+page.svelte:19` switch teal/emerald accents to blue for nav links and “Top PR” card styles.

- `services/app/src/routes/stacks/[id]/plan/+page.svelte:110` switch teal/emerald accents to blue for back link, saved-state text, success alert, user message bubble, primary button, and “Save plan” secondary button.

**Notes**
- `services/app/data/stacks.json:41` contains “green to blue” only as conversation text history, not UI theme logic; I recommend leaving it unchanged.
- No other code files in the repo currently use green/teal/emerald theme classes.

If you want, I can apply these changes now in one pass and run `npm run check` + `npm run build`.
